Welcome to Musical Instruments Website!

There are over 2000 musical instruments from around the world, and there are 6 different types of genres of music where each one of them have own groups with sounds and relation of instruments, such as what are similar and differences.

Browse the Groups of Musical Instruments:

Brass Instruments

-When it started? 19th Century

-Which country created first brass? Greece

-How many brass instruments are there? There are only 5 brass instruments

-How many countries play brass instruments as part of the tradition? North America and Europe

Keyboard Instruments

-When it started? 3rd Century B.C.

-Which country created first Keyboard? Italy

-How many genres of Keyboards are there? 4 types of Keyboards Instruments; Electrophones, Idiophones, Aerophones, and Chordophones

-How many keyboard instruments are there? 43 of Keyboard Instruments

-How many countries play keyboard instruments as part of their tradition? Almost around the world, but the most use in Keyboard instruments are in Europe and North America.

Orchestra Instruments

-When it started?

-Which country created first percussion?

-How many Orchestra instruments are there?

-How many countries play Orchestra instruments as part of their tradition?

Percussion Instruments

-When it started? 6000 B.C.

-Which country created first percussion? Turkey

-How many percussion instruments are there? There are 339 Percussion Instruments from around the countries

-How many countries play percussion instruments as part of their tradition? There are 5 continent area play percussion instruments; South America, Middle East, Latin America/Caribbean, South Asia, and Africa

String Instruments

-When it started? 2500-3000 B.C.

-Which country created first string? Mesopotamia

-how many string instruments are there? There are over 402 string intruments from around the countries

-How many countries play string instruments as part of the tradition? Almost All the country use the string instruments as par tof their tradition because there are several types of string instruments where each one of them have their own experiences where most countries use them as part of the characteristic of their cultures.

Woodwind Instruments

-When it started? 900 B.C.

-Which country created first Woodwind? Eastern Europe

-How many woodwind instruments are there? There are 145 string instruments

-How many countries play woodwind instruments as part of their tradition? Europe play the most woodwind instruments as part of their tradition, though in North America, South America, Africa and Asia play more woodwinds, too.

Quote: "People are like musical instruments: their sound depends on who touches them." -Virgil
